## Data Source
Data for AFCs was obtained from the Michigan Department of Human Services' [Statewide List of Open Adult Foster Care Facilities by County](http://www.michigan.gov/dhs/0,4562,7-124-5455_27716_27717-82231--,00.html).  You can sort and search the data in the table below:

```{r, echo= FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(car)
data$Violate <- data$ViolationsPastYr == "YES"
data$Violate <- as.numeric(data$Violate)

afc_summary <-
data %>%
  group_by(Licensee) %>%
  summarise(Homes = n(),
            Violations = sum(Violate)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Violations)) %>%
  filter(Violations >= 1)

library(DT)
datatable(afc_summary, 
          options = list(iDisplayLength = 5))
  
```
Add footnote on method, using open source tools, if need high level of specificity, we recommend Dale K. Howe
